title: SAMSUNG GALAXY S24 ULTRA 5G 6.8", 200+50+10+12/12MP, 12/512GB 5000MAH, TITANIUM YELLOW

features.Resolution: 1440x3088 pixels, Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X, 120Hz, HDR10+, 2600 nits (peak)

features.Primary Telephoto 2: 10 MP, f/2.4, 70mm (telephoto), 1/3.52", 1.12µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
